name: 4 Days Later
description:
A survival game where you kill zombies as long as possible and unlock endings.

You wake up after 1 month of coma. You forgot everything that happened. With bravery, you explore the unknown truth of what's going on.

In this game, you can unlock weapons, power ups, etc to help you survive for the upcoming danger. You have the choice to survive as long as possible or unlock endings in this game.

This game is made around 1 week that me and my friend, Crimson made just for fun.

Download for Android too: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.NicDev.FourDaysLater

Also the game will receive updates such as bug fixes, new content, etc.

Controls:

- A and D: Move

- Space: Jump

- Left Mouse: Attack

- E: Interact, Read

- 1 to 3: Switch weapons

- I to P: Switch Guns (if you have one)

- Escape: Pause
